Class Vector3D

java.lang.Object
  Vector3D
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class Vector3D
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable

This class can store a 3D vector. It knows about its x,y,z components This class also includes methods for converting the vector to a string and for checking if another vector is equal to the one stored in the class.

Version:
$Id: Vector3D.java,v 1.4 2003/04/16 10:04:15 mtjspaan Exp $
Author:
Nikos Massios, Matthijs Spaan
